At 03:53 PM 7/22/2002 +0000, dph wrote:

>Of course, if we had triggers and a 3-d map, I would make all my ocean
>going scenarios one map where you have to do things in order.

Yea, I was thinking Gladiator 3D would be sweet, but the thing I'm working 
on now is going nowhere (due to lack of time mostly) and if I found some 
more I was going to help with OpenGlad, but so far no time for that 
either.  Well, maybe someday.
